descriptor.name: Homemade Love Khatta Meetha Lemon Pickle -250g
descriptor.short_desc: This one's a delightful mix of sweet and spicy (khatta-meetha) for a flavour explosion in every bite. Made with a secret blend of spices, it's perfectly balanced and goes great with everything from mathris to comforting khichdi, and even savory potato parathas.
descriptor.long_desc:
"- Sweet meets heat! Unlike your typical pickle, our lemon pickle offers a delightful khatta-meetha (sweet and sour) flavour explosion that will dance on your taste buds.
- Crafted with love: We use the time-tested method of hand-cutting lemons and sun-drying them for authenticity and a superior texture, just like your grandma used to make!
- Your culinary companion: Homemade Love Lemon pickle pairs beautifully with your favourite dishes, from comforting jeera rice and dal makhani to crispy parathas and savoury palak paneer.
- More than just delicious: Our lemon pickle is not only a flavour powerhouse, but it's also low in cholesterol and packed with essential nutrients like iron, vitamin A, and fibre for a healthy and satisfying addition to your meals, snacks, or chaat.

"

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: Plot No-13, D Block, 1, Pole no-984, Gali No- 4 Shyam Vihar, Najafgargh South West Delhi Delhi 110043

descriptor.name: Homemade Love- Imli Chutney with cashews and raisins
descriptor.short_desc: This is a family recipe of Imli chutney which is so good and finger-licking tasty. We also call this saunth chutney as it is spiced with ground ginger powder, tamarind, jaggery, dry fruits and spices. If you love making chaat, pakodas or bhajjis at home, this Imli Chutney is a must have!
descriptor.long_desc:
"•	THICK CONSISTENCY: This mouth-watering chutney has a slightly thick consistency due to the tamarind pulp. It’s easy to scoop out of the jar, and just one scoop is enough to elevate the taste of your snacks. Just drizzle it over your samosa and get an instant tangy punch.
•	THE FLAVOR OF INDIA: Because we make our products at home using the recipe passed down from our mom and grandmom, you can rest assured that you’ll get only the authentic taste of saunth chutney. The overall hit of the flavour will be somewhere in the centre of sweet and tangy with a bit of heat in there.
•	ALL-NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Non-GMO, locally and ethically sourced ingredients and ensure you get a healthy product. We use tamarind pulp, jaggery, sugar, black salt, jeera, chili powder, garam masala, ginger powder, kaju, and raisins to put together this lip-smacking condiment.
•	RELISH IT WITH YOUR FAVORITE SNACK: Whether it is dahi bhallay, chaats, dahi vada, moong dal k ladoo, golgappas, cutlets, samosas, pakoras, or just about any fried snack, our tamarind chutney is sure to perk up the taste like nothing else. Saunth chutney jar can be left in the fridge for months. The chutney stays fresh without losing its original taste and flavour.
•	GLUTEN-FREE & VEGAN: Our tamarind chutney is low-fat, vegan, and gluten-free. We keep preservatives, artificial flavours, and enhancers out of our recipes. Known to improve digestion, especially after snacking on fried foods. The added nutrition from raisins turns it into a wholesome chutney no ketchup can ever come close to.

"

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: Plot No-13, D Block, 1, Pole no-984, Gali No- 4 Shyam Vihar, Najafgargh South West Delhi Delhi 110043

descriptor.name: Homemade Love-  Molgapodi - 150g
descriptor.short_desc: Also knows as gunpowder, this authentic recipe is a coarse powder mixture of spices and ground lentils that pairs perfectly with South Indian foods like idlis, dosas, vada or even hot ghee rice.
descriptor.long_desc:
•	Excellent side dish for Idli, Dosa, Appam, Chapati and Roti Varieties. Create Instantly South Indian Style Idli Chutney, with our Chutney Powder. Most Authentic Taste and ready instantly.
•	No added flavour or preservative
•	Preparation - Take Sufficient amount of the chutney powder in a vessel. Add oil of your choice or water. (preferably til oil or coconut oil), mix well and Enjoy
•	No Artificial Colours, Flavours or Preservatives. No Onion & Garlic.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: Plot No-13, D Block, 1, Pole no-984, Gali No- 4 Shyam Vihar, Najafgargh South West Delhi Delhi 110043

descriptor.name: Homemade Love- Gajar Gobhi Shalgam Achaar - 400g - Seasonal*
descriptor.short_desc: Made with fresh, local veggies & a family recipe, our Gajar Gobhi Shalgam pickle delivers authentic taste & unforgettable aroma. Enjoy a spoonful of memories with every bite! Perfect with rotis, dal, rice & more.
descriptor.long_desc:
•	An authentic pickle recipe that has been passed down for generations and is a perfect combination of carrots, cauliflowers,
•	Our gajar, gobhi shalgam pickle is made with fresh and natural ingredients that are all locally sourced. The freshness of the pickles makes it tastier and awards you with an unforgettable aroma.
•	A spoonful of the pickle clouds you with memories and let’s you recall the times you spent with friends and family while enjoying this pickle. Home style recipe without any artificial preservatives.
•	Our pickle is made at home in small batches to ensure we don’t compromise on quality when serving to you. Made at home and stirred with love, we deliver to you a fresh jar of pickle so you can relish the flavours endlessly.
•	Serve with makki roti, daal, mathi, chawal or parantha.Whether it be dal rice, parathas or khichdi, the gajar gobhi shalgam pickle is an easy addition to all your meals that blends in smoothly and elevates the taste of your meal.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: Plot No-13, D Block, 1, Pole no-984, Gali No- 4 Shyam Vihar, Najafgargh South West Delhi Delhi 110043

descriptor.name: Homemade Love- Punjabi Aam ka Achaar - 250g
descriptor.short_desc: Homemade Love Punjabi Aam Ka Achaar goes great with many foods, like poori/puri, paratha, and rice. We use an authentic recipe, made with the best quality masala, hand-cut mangoes and sun-drying to create a delicious and healthy condiment.
descriptor.long_desc:
"•	THE BEST WAYS TO ENJOY IT: Theres no right way of eating mango pickle. Every household has its own unique way of enjoying it. But here are a few universally agreed foods with which Aam ka achar would pair the best. Each bite whether taken with piping hot flatbread, aloo ka paratha, dal, or boiled rice, will unfold almost instantly the entire flavour profile of the zesty Punjabi mango pickle. You will love to have it every day of the week!
•	HOMEMADE, AUTHENTIC RECIPE: Our homemade recipe is second to none. It is just how moms & grandmoms would make it back in the day. We first source raw mangoes from the ever-so-green and abundant farms of Punjab just before hardcore summer sets in. We then hand-cut, sun-dried, and marinate the uniformly cut slices with a bunch of spices.
•	NON-GMO INGREDIENTS: We use raw mangoes, methi seeds, Fennel-Saunf, Hing-Asafoetida, and Fenugreek-Methi before finally dipping the mixture in mustard oil and leaving it to mature for up to four weeks. All the ingredients are natural, locally sourced, and non-GMO.
•	HEALTHY & NUTRITIOUS: You get a pungent, full-bodied fermented flavour that is just the perfect accompaniment to your favourite meals. A low-cholesterol side dish brimming with iron, vitamin A and fibres. Tasty, healthy, and nutritious, how you would like it.

"

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: Plot No-13, D Block, 1, Pole no-984, Gali No- 4 Shyam Vihar, Najafgargh South West Delhi Delhi 110043

descriptor.name: Homemade Love-  Green Chilli pickle -200g
descriptor.short_desc: Our homemade green chili pickle is spicy and delicious, made just like Mom used to make! It goes great with any meal, like rice, poori/puri, parathas, rotis or curries, bringing back memories of your favorite family meals.
descriptor.long_desc:
"•	UNIQUE FLAVOR & AROMA: Our green chilli pickle is treated with ground mustard seeds, turmeric, and zesty vinegar which imparts a distinct flavour, aroma and taste that’s not easily unforgettable. It’s truly spicy, tangy, and loaded with flavour, quickly reminding you of the authentic smell and taste of how your mom used to make it.
•	PAIRS WITH EVERY FOOD: There isn’t any ‘right’ food item to eat it with. Hari Mirch ka Achar pairs well with practically any meal under the sun. Savor it with hot pudina laccha parathas or relish it with curries, rice, flatbread, dal, and pulao etc.
•	A RIDE DOWN THE MEMORY LANE: Pickles are deep-rooted in the Indian culture and have the amazing ability to take us back in time. Our chili pickle will quickly make you remember the last time you’d this spicy side-dish with your friends/family. It’s sure to add a spicy kick to any simple meal.
•	PURE, NON-GMO INGREDIENTS: We detest the use of preservatives; which is why we use only natural, ethically sourced ingredients to induce and maintain the authentic taste of our homemade chili pickle. We use farm-sourced, sun-dried green chillies, salt, mustard oil, mustard seeds, mixed spices, and lastly vinegar for the extra kick.
•	VEGAN & GLUTEN-FREE: Hot green chilli pickle is entirely vegan, gluten-free, low in oil, and contains no sugar. You will have your cravings for spicy taken care of, without chowing down junk food. It’s just the perfect complement to Indian meals!

"

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: Plot No-13, D Block, 1, Pole no-984, Gali No- 4 Shyam Vihar, Najafgargh South West Delhi Delhi 110043

descriptor.name: Homemade Love - Sweet and Sour Mango Chutney (300 g)
descriptor.short_desc: This is a grated Khatti Meethi Aam Chutney. Raw Mango slivers are steeped in a host of  spices like cardamom and cinnamon with almonds and raisins making this sweet and tangy. This relish goes well with foods like Parantha, Daal Chaawal.
descriptor.long_desc:
•	Spruce Up Dull Meals: You don’t cook spicy meals every day. Some days you’ve to settle for slightly less exciting ones like dal, plain rice, sabji, etc. But don’t fret, you can now pour this tangy goodness over the meal or just keep it on the side as a dip. The perfect way to spruce up any dull meal without having to rely on fast food!
•	AMAZING NUTRITIONAL VALUE: Rejoice, because your favorite aam ki chutney is not just incredibly tasty but also has amazing over-the-top nutritional value. It contains vitamin C which steps up immunity. Regular consumption can also protect the body from diarrhea, scurvy, dysentery, and indigestion during summer. Nope, you don’t have to chow it down in copious amounts to get the ingredients to take effect. Just a spoonful would suffice.
•	ORIGINAL RECIPE OF INDIA: We use only authentic grandma recipes to ensure our product is a true standout. Our ingredients are all pure and our recipe is passed down as an heirloom. Immediately remind you of how your mom/grandmom used to make mango chutney. This will feel like home if you’re living abroad.
•	ALL THE AMAZING WAYS TO ENJOY IT: Aam ki chutney is best enjoyed with a simple meal, such as rice and dal. Some folks also like to spread it over rotis/paratha, while others appreciate it more when used as a dip with street food like samosa, pakora, kachori, etc. There’s no right way of eating it. Just do it how it brings you the most pleasure!

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: Plot No-13, D Block, 1, Pole no-984, Gali No- 4 Shyam Vihar, Najafgargh South West Delhi Delhi 110043

descriptor.name: Homemade Love-  Garlic Pickle - 250g
descriptor.short_desc: Our Homemade Garlic Pickle hits every note: spiced, salty, sour & umami. It’s a great way to include garlic in our everyday diet! Garlic is marinated in a blend of spices, preserved by natural, pure oil and sun-dried. The oil seeps into the achaar and the spices giving the pickle its distinct aroma and special taste that will turn up any boring meal.
descriptor.long_desc:
"•	AUTHENTIC PICKLE RECIPE: It all boils down to the recipe. Homemade Love makes authentic Indian pickles with tantalizing blends of exotic vegetables using only home-based recipes passed down from grandmas. Each garlic clove bursts with an authentic tingly flavour to excite you about your meal.
•	SPICE UP ANY MEAL EFFORTLESSLY: Your meal is incomplete without a tiny spoonful of garlic achaar on the side. So, why not get your hands on something that’s authentic and just the right amount of spicy and sharp-tasting to uplift the palate at every bite? A distinct flavour that people across India have come to love for generations.
•	A KITCHEN MUST-HAVE: If there’s anything you can’t do without in your pantry, it has to be this. The garlic pickle is always ready to serve. Whether you’re enjoying a solo mid-day meal or sitting with many friends.
•	GOES WITH ANY FOOD FLAWLESSLY: Brighten up any dish, be it plain dal, veggie, meat, rice, or just piping hot parathas – garlic pickle will not disappoint. Put a spoonful in the centre of a naan and roll it up. Enjoy this delicious combo on the go!
"

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: Plot No-13, D Block, 1, Pole no-984, Gali No- 4 Shyam Vihar, Najafgargh South West Delhi Delhi 110043

descriptor.name: Homemade Love- Panjeeri  250g
descriptor.short_desc: Our homemade Panjeeri brings together different traditional flavours and is super yummy and healthy sweet,  It also helps generate body heat and soothes sore muscles during winters. With a blend of whole wheat flour, sooji, ghee, sugar, edible gum, ginger powder, seeds and lots of nuts, it can be paired best with a warm glass of milk to savour.
descriptor.long_desc:
•	ANCESTRAL RECIPE: Panjeeri is a snack that has been prevalent in homes since thousands of years. A delight that is enjoyed by everyone in the family regardless of age and is finished in an instant. This winter, we bring to you the goodness of this ancestral recipe with its maximum benefits.
•	IMMUNITY BOOSTER: In addition to its wholesome flavour, Panjeeri is also an excellent immunity booster and helps evade seasonal infections and illnesses. It is also known for its ability to fuel one with energy and vigour to easily skim through the season.
•	HOMEMADE AND HEALTHY: Our Panjeeri is made with whole wheat flour, and combined with healthy foods like ghee, edible gum and dry fruits that does not require you to stop through the season. You can relish the product to your heart’s content because we make it at home with love and care.
•	A MUST-HAVE FOR NEW MOTHERS: Besides being an immunity booster and a healthy snack, Panjeeri can easily be called a must-have in the diets of new mothers. It helps in lactating them by stimulating breast milk flow and helps them regain strength post delivery.
•	OPEN THE JAR AND ENJOY: Open the jar and relish spoonfuls of our Panjeeri to your heart’s content. A product whipped for your sweet palate, we firmly believe it also holds the potential to take you down the memory lane!

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: Plot No-13, D Block, 1, Pole no-984, Gali No- 4 Shyam Vihar, Najafgargh South West Delhi Delhi 110043
